name: Space Husbands
description:
Story:

Space Husbands Captain Flock and Commander Dirk were on their way to retire their commissions. After a lifetime of adventure they were ready to kick their feet up and relax.

However, on the way to their retirement party their ship was sucked into a wormhole, drained of energy, and spat out on the other side of the galaxy!

Now they're stuck with a crashed ship, out of fuel, on an abandoned space station, surrounded by rampaging killbots! They've come a long way, but they're not done yet!

Can you help them escape the station before the killbots get them!?!

How to Play:

Use the 1 and 2 keys to switch between characters.

Mouse Click or Drag to Navigate.

Avoid the Wandering Killbots while you search the station for keys to the Reactor Chamber.

Make sure you get out before the horde of Rampaging Killbots breaks loose and hunts you down!
